title: Tech stack
sub_title: Many people ask me which tools, languages, and services I use or have used in the projects — so I gathered everything in one place.

strengths.title: Skills beyond code
strengths.sub_title: Skills I have developed along the way to build high-quality digital products.

items.title: Frontend development
items.description: Interfaces that combine performance, accessibility, and modern design — always focused on the people who will use them.

items.title: Responsive design
items.description: Interfaces designed with a mobile-first approach, adapted to different screen sizes, and focused on usability across all devices.

items.title: Software architecture
items.description: Applications designed to scale: following DDD principles and engineering best practices to create scalable, organized, and sustainable architectures.

items.title: Agile methodologies
items.description: Application of agile practices such as Navway, Scrum, and Kanban to deliver value continuously and collaboratively.

items.title: Technical leadership
items.description: Leading development teams with a focus on quality, code standardization, technical alignment, and mentoring.

items.title: Teamwork
items.description: Effective collaboration with different profiles — stakeholders, designers, and developers — promoting communication and joint results.

footer.title: From code to the world: see the results
